WRITING.TEXT: After further research, it has been found that the chair purposely launched itself and nearly managed to get away with framing the father, however the police managed to prove the chair's guilt. The chair has been sentenced 200 hours of bathroom service.

I love seeing pictures of Detroit that reminds us of the good areas. It seems like every time someone hears "Detroit" they immediately think of a rundown, bad city. It's nice to see the upsides of the historic city.
Could you then be Jeffrey Dahmer's next life?
